name: C h a o s
description: I think we've all felt like this at some point in the past 2 years. The chaos has been constantly feeding in until it sometime feels like there's just too much happening to handle. Power through, viewer! You can make it! Made with a lot of metallic paints, so the painting changes based on your perspective. Just like how the chaos can feel so different from different perspectives. Maybe there's a lesson there.
